name: Custom Order Maild 3D2: It's a Night Magic Love Hotel Karaoke All in Pack
summary: Included in this DLC: 【New Yotogi Events】 Love Hotel Tour *Compatible with Muku, Majime, and Rindere heroine types. 【Costume】 Winter Sweater & Dress Set 【Hairstyles】 Empress Hair Set Cool Beauty Hair Set + Accessories Set 【Background】 Love Hotel 2 【Dance】 Reformative Heartography Karaoke Dance
